description:
I am a wife, a mother and a Realtor. I love my job!

I have lived in this area all my life. I know this community very well. I have said many times that this job is ideal for my personality  I can meet new wonderful people. I love to negotiate on my client's behalf to get the best deal! My priority to you is excellent service, with creative service in every detail of the Real Estate transaction.

I am a true believer in the Golden Rule. I will work to guide buyers through the entire process and help them find just the right home within their "financial comfort zone." I do not believe in going above what you can afford and eating PB&J sandwiches every night.

As for Sellers I can offer fresh Ideas. Working through all the steps of the process. Staging the home, planning strategies to not only sell the house but also finding the Next place that you can call Home. Both buying and selling can be very stressful. 

With all of that said, the best achievements I have are my two beautiful daughters! They are both such blessings. God and Family above all and the rest will be provided.
 Member of the National Association of Realtors® and Birmingham Association of Realtors®.

Tan Akles  epitomizes integrity, energy, hard work, and creativity in every detail of a real estate transaction. Tan grew up in a small town Heflin, AL where she spent most of her life. Her experience in sales began at the age of 16  while selling vacation packages for a timeshare resort. This sparked an eye opener for her as she gained momentum learning the science to mastering a conversation. Tan joined Keller Williams Realty in June of 2015 where she began a spectacular career in real estate. Tan closed her first transaction 37 days after being a licensed agent and have received awards of excellence in her market center every month since Aug. 2015. She is constantly among the top 10% of agents in her market center month over month and week after week. Her hard work and dedication was not only noticed by her market center but also by Keller Williams Realty International and they awarded her a Medallion of Excellence, named her 2016 Rookie of the Year for the Southeast Region out of 44,000 agents and the 2017 People Choice Realtor Award. 

Tan brings extraordinary negotiation skills and cutting edge market strategies in addition to uncompromising integrity as a benchmark to service her clients. Tan is currently working to achieve her brokers license and is dedicated to leading the industry by educating herself with all the knowledge one can obtain to be a phenomenal expert. Her Slogan, "Tan have the Plan" encourages,inspires, and motivate those that aren't on the right track to simply create a blueprint plan and Master it. Tan coaches and encourages her clients to make life rewarding real estate decisions that impact families for generations to come. She currently owns several rental properties and she caters to those who desire a second chance at life decisions and have the will power, and endurance to live a life by design and control their destiny.

My Client First Philosophy:
There are many qualities and skills that go into being an excellent real estate professional -- integrity, in-depth community and market knowledge, marketing savvy, effective negotiation skills, and a high-quality, professional network -- ALL of which are hallmarks of how I work!

That said, in my experience as a Pell City real estate professional, I've also found that providing the very best service is essentially about putting my clients first. This means keeping myself accessible, being a good listener as well as a good communicator, and responding quickly to your needs.

This "client first" philosophy has always been my approach and it requires me to continually improve my skills and ways of doing business. In addition, I've found that the latest technologies are enabling me to do everything I've always done, only much more quickly and efficiently. They've also helped me to extend the range of services I provide to my clients.

My Community Involvement:
I was awarded the esteemed honor of St. Clair REALTOR OF THE YEAR 2010 and 2015. I served as President of the St. Clair Association of Realtors as well. Both of these positions are elected from among my realtor peers, and I am VERY honored to be of service to an organization that I care dearly.

I am very involved in my job because I truly love what I do! I am a certified Buyer's Representative and thoroughly enjoy helping my clients to find their dream home in the Pell City and surrounding areas. 


I am also a member of the BPW, Business and Professional Women's Club. I was the Alabama state winner for the Virginia Allen Young Careerist Program for 2008. With this title, I attended the National conference in Atlanta and competed for the National title. It was one of the most rewarding experiences of my adult life! I learned so much about myself and met some incredible women from around the country! With the Alabama state title, I was responsible for presenting scholarship awards for our State winners and the winners from my town. It was so wonderful to watch these girls receive money to further their education! Also, I am involved in BPW/Girl Scout's Leadership conference where I hosted 2 workshops; one on Interview Tips/Dress for Success and the other on Writing a Letter to a Congressman. It was such a joy to assist in preparing and educating these young girls for life after high school.


There are so many other organizations that I volunteer to help. I believe, "Life is about building relationships and helping other people." So when you decide that you'd like to buy or sell a home in the Pell City areas, please contact me for expert real estate advice.

We understand that buying or selling a home is more than just a transaction: its a life-changing experience. Thats why our team of highly-seasoned real estate professionals is dedicated to providing exceptional, personalized service for all of our clients. We take great pride in the relationships we build and always work relentlessly on the clients behalf to help them achieve their real estate goals.

Kami Lockett was born and raised in the city of Birmingham, rich in culture and entertainment. Kami's legal background along with her progressing knowledge of the Real Estate market makes her a fantastic negotiator of contracts. Kami also has a stellar reputation for quick, timely response and strives to be the Realtor Extraordinaire aiming to please by delivering the first class treatment that her client's deserve. The foundation of her exceptional service is founded upon hard work and honesty. Kami loves what she does and her community. She feels best when her clients are happy. As her client, you will have the inside information on the best local resources. When you work with Kami you get a skilled realtor who will find you exactly what you need in the home you purchase but also in all the ways that makes for a great community.

Having the right real estate agent means having an agent who is committed to helping you buy or sell your property with the highest level of expertise in your local market. This means also to help you in understanding each step of the buying or selling process. Nothing is more exciting to me than the gratifying feeling I get from helping people meet their real estate needs. You can count on me to always do whats in your best interest. I pride myself on being honest, trustworthy, and knowledgeable in the real estate market. I know how important it is to find the right property or get the best offer for your property. Therefore I will make it my responsibility to help you achieve those goals. Whether you are an experienced investor, small business owner or a first time buyer, I can help you in finding the property of your dreams.

Contact me to today for 1st Class Services!

Ted McLaughlin values the trust that people place in him. In his career as a real estate professional, he always keeps his clients goals and dreams top-of-mind. He is keenly aware of the responsibility he has, not just to his clients, but to the good name that is associated with the company he keeps. Ted has earned his CSP, ABR, CMP designations and is a relocation specialist. When you work with Ted, you enjoy his friendly demeanor, as well as his extensive background and expertise in new and pre-loved home sales. His approach immediately puts you at ease and helps make your home buying experience stress-free.Contract Ted today for all your investment needs. Youll be glad you did.
Brian has been a Realtor at Lovejoy Realty since 1998 and is an active Licensed Homebuilder.  Brian's background includes an Engineering degree and MBA.  see BrianCamp.com for more info on Brian.

Known as the "Distressed Property and Short Sale Expert in Local Market".  Please visit http://www.stephanieford.com/help-im-in-trouble.asp  to answer your questions about whether or not to do a short sale to save yourself from foreclosure.

     Experience counts when you are making a decision for buying or selling property.  Since this will be one of the largest decisions that you will ever make, why risk it with an inexperienced or part time agent. So whether you need to purchase or sell property, make sure that you have the "best" Realtor working for you.  Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Personal Mission Statement 

To be the best ME that I can be; To treat everyone with respect and to treat everyone like I want to be treated; I have learned to NEVER give up and to keep my eye on the prize. 

There aren't any failures in life, just opportunities to make you better for the next journey. Successful people live life on purpose and keep a winning attitude.. Regardless of the outcome, 

I will ALWAYS be a WINNER!

All of our lives are so fast-paced and busy these days. I appreciate in advance you taking the time to get to know me and my professional standards. I am extremely blessed to have a large, supportive network of family and friends and also blessed to call Alabama home. I spent many years away from home due, in part, to my service in the United States Air Force. Though I did enjoy my travels, it was always nice to come back to Alabama. Alabama is a wonderful place to live and to raise my children. It is also a perfect place to be an entrepreneur with the promise of providing a comfortable lifestyle for my family.

Becoming a Realtor is a path that I felt very drawn toward for many years. Throughout my professional life, I have gained an extensive amount of knowledge and experience in sales, marketing, and property management. These acquired skills serve me and my clients well in this dynamic industry. In addition to this, I have always made customer service my number one priority. In the business world, as in personal, the Golden Rule should always hold true: Do unto others as you would have them do unto you. I will always be diligent in my efforts to base my entire professional reputation on serving my clients with honesty and integrity.

I am confident that I can assist you with any real estate needs you may have. The RE/MAX Realty Brokers agents are forthright, hard-working, and accomplished. I feel honored to be part of such an outstanding team and am very serious about upholding that same reputation myself. Our aggressive marketing plan and creative advertising can assist you in your efforts and get you definite results.

Selling or purchasing a home, for the right price, is very important to an individuals financial well-being. I am honored to have the opportunity to earn your business. Please consider me your point of contact and your Realtor. Also keep in mind that I am available to assist anyone you may know whether they are buying or selling property, locally and outside of the state. You can rest assured that I will treat them with good faith, loyalty, and professionalism.

Collier Swecker and his Mega Agent Real Estate Team at RE/MAX Advantage is Birminghams most sought after real estate sales team. Our aggressive Marketing Program will help put more money in your pocket and give you the competitive edge you need to price your home aggressively in the current real estate market. 

Guaranteed Sale Program. The Mega Agent Real Estate Team at RE/MAX Advantage GUARANTEES to sell your home at a price and a deadline that you both agree to or the Mega Agent Real Estate Team will step in and buy your home. Find out if you qualify for this powerful home selling program. Visit our website for more information and conditions regarding this unique program. Why hire us to sell your home? In addition to our Guaranteed Sale Program, we offer our Popular Hassle Free Listing Program. The Mega Agent Real Estate Team only asks that you agree to list your home with us for ONE DAY and if any day after that you are unhappy with your service you can FIRE US! With our Hassle-Free Listing Program you have complete flexibility . from Full Service to Do It Yourself. Visit www.GuaranteedHassleFree dot com we also offer Buyers our LOVE IT OR LEAVE IT BUYERS GUARANTEE where we will sell it for FREE if you're not completely happy with your home. We offer this to our Sellers to create more demand for their homes and also to our buyer clients which takes a lot of stress off our buyers and creates more demand for our Seller's listings. 

Our MONTHLY marketing budget is more than what most agents spend in a year. We attract over 500 new home buyers monthly and we have nearly 10,000 home buyers looking for homes in the Greater Birmingham area.We have a unique technology where we can instantly see which buyers would be interested in a particular home based on their current search criteria and behavior. We demonstrate can demonstrate this technology at our listing appointment. We have three divisions within the Mega Agent Real Estate Team. The Listing Division Leader (Collier Swecker) focus 100% on marketing our client's homes on every available marketing outlet, including Internet & Radio. The Buyer's Division handle the buyer clients and are elite coached, local and full-time professionals who are selling up to 10 times as many homes annually compared to an average Realtor. The Property Management Division operates through our independent Brokerage Mega Agent Rental Management. Our full time staff and agents manage every aspect of property management for single family homes and home owners associations. Our Client Care Team of full-time professional staff handle internet inquiries and phone calls. That way we're not losing any buyers who are interested in our Seller's homes.

Why hire us to help you find a home?- We have access to homes that are not yet on the market.- We offer our buyers a Love It or Leave It Buyers Guarantee. If you're not happy for ANY reason, we will step in and sell it for free.- Each agent on The Mega Agent Real Estate Team has been elite coached by an elite business coach.- We generally sell more homes in a MONTH than the typical agent sells in a YEAR.Tired of searching for homes only to find out they're sold?We offer a free backstage pass to the most accurate search engine, Greater Alabama Multiple Listing Service, which we realtors use to find properties.Our goal is to make our clients 100% satisfied which is why we offer our performance guarantees. 

Collier Swecker is a founding partner of the Mega Agent Real Estate Team at RE/MAX Advantage which has been recognized as RE/MAX's Number 1 Selling Team in the Birmingham Alabama market. He leads one of the most technologically advanced and forward thinking real estate teams in Alabama. Collier is also a successful entrepreneur, video blogger, and speaker. Collier graduated from Auburn University (B.A., 1998), Cumberland School of Law (Juris Doctor, 2002) and Washington University School of Law in St. Louis (Masters of Law in Taxation, 2003). Collier was the principal partner in a law practice, Swecker and Sparks, for 3 years in Auburn, Alabama. Collier left the law practice in 2006 for a new career in real estate development and sales.

I show integrity in all that I do, continually showing dedication and going the extra mile.  

Specialties:  Building and Cultivating Relationships, Detail Oriented, Analytical, Multi-tasking, and Creativity.

Ty Taylor is a licensed realtor with Keller Williams. He is honored to be a part of such a wonderful company and team and looks forward to cultivating his entrepreneurial spirit by helping others achieve their dreams of home buying and selling. Ty was honored with Brik Realty's 2017 Rising Star Award as well as the 2017 Brik Realty Million Dollar Club and 2018 Brik Realty Mortar Club. He has been The Kellie Drozdowicz Group's top producer in both February and August of 2018 followed by January, March and June of 2019. Most recently, Ty was The Kellie Drozdowicz Group's #3 Producer of the Year for 2019, followed by KDG #2 Producer of the Year for 2020 and 2021 Homesnap's Fastest - Growing Agent Award winner.

Ty graduated from Tulane University with a Bachelor of Arts in History and Psychology and was a member of Sigma Chi Fraternity. After graduation, he moved to Los Angeles for 12 years to pursue his dreams of writing and acting but was brought back home to Birmingham by the "soul and character of the people." He was quickly embraced upon returning home and was named one of Birmingham Magazine's "Birmingham Beautiful" and one of About Town Magazine's "Man About Town." He is still very active in the Film/TV industry and can be seen in numerous movies, TV shows/commercials and local theatrical productions. Ty feels truly fortunate to be able to blend his passion of assisting others pursuit of their life goals and aspirations while still having the ability to pursue his love of acting and storytelling.

Ty's hobbies include Alabama Football, Los Angeles Laker Basketball, anything outdoors, working out, boxing, guitar and travel. He has two dogs, Laker and Jolene, whose multiple cross country trips make them the most loving travel companions a guy can have.

Stella Trott Esdale Realtor - Interior Designer Remax Advantage - Residential and Commercial Real Estate, Room Service Unlimited - Design and Home Staging. As a life resident of Birmingham Alabama, I know and understand the real estate market in my State, From the mountains in Fort Payne to the Beaches in Gulf Shores. Understanding the way a person lives and works is both interesting and important to me. I love getting to know my clients and helping them achieve their hopes and dreams. It is great feeling of accomplishment for me to know my clients are loving the homes where they choose to live and that I have in a small way helped.

I enjoy spending time with my husband Blake and our daughter, Paisley. She keeps us busy with softball, and cheerleading. We love to entertain with family and friends. Traveling is our favorite pastime, Disney Cruises to be exact. I am an active member at Church of the Highlands and love to volunteer with the church in the community. I LOVE being a realtor and help clients in one of the most important decisions in their lives. I pride myself on making the process as seamless and enjoyable as possible. It would be a pleasure and an honor to work for you.

Vicki, a self-described workaholic, brings a wealth of experience and education to her role as sales associate and has a little different outlook on real estate. She not only gets results for her clients, she works tirelessly to turn buying and selling a home into a pleasant process.  Time and attention are gifts she gives freely.With a masters degree and 18 years experience in teaching, Vicki decided to expand on other interests.  Because of her love for decorating, she opened an interior design business and was also a professional decorating consultant. Her work was featured on local television segments offering tips on design, style & color in decorating homes and two of her homes appeared on the Tour of Homes.  This love of helping people, transitioned into a career in real estate. Prior to earning her real estate license, Vicki was a personal assistant to owner of an appraisal/real estate company and then office manager of several real estate companies in Birmingham.  Thus, giving Vicki experience in assisting people in different aspects of the real estate industry. With an educational background, genuine concern and continuing commitment to excellence, Vicki can assist you on a path to success.  Her high integrity, credentials and experience, combined with her genuine concern for individuals and quest for professionalism in the real estate industry, have created satisfied relationships built on trust and confidence.Vickis experience, talents, and skills in explaining contracts, property values, staging homes to sell, negotiating contracts, and working with attorneys and appraisers, help to guide her clients through the unfamiliar and emotional process of buying and selling property.While all of Vickis education and experience are impressive, it is still the personal honor of referrals and the new friendships made that Vicki considers most valuable!

Terry & Micshelle DeWitt, Associate Brokers,  Working as a team ensures our customers and clients receive the highest level of service obtainable. The team approach also makes sure all your real estate transactions are smooth, professional, timely, pleasant and as profitable as possible!   Our professional designations of Associate Brokers, GRI, and Club of Excellence status has prepared us for and taken us to a higher level of customer/client appreciation. We know that you'll agree that time is a valuable commodity and that is why working with experienced agents that know the market, customs, contracts and how to negotiate will be an asset to someone who is in the position of buying or selling a home. We are Christians and certainly reverence the Golden Rule in our daily business practices. Also, as full time agents we will give you and your property the attention they deserve!    We specialize in new construction and the existing home market in eastern Jefferson and St. Clair Counties. We service the eastern area of Birmingham and St. Clair County including, but not limited to Trussville, Argo, Pinson, Clay, Moody, Leeds, Odenville, Springville and Ashville. Our 26 years experience in Real Estate will benefit you with a higher level of thought process, follow-up and follow-thru.   Whether you are relocating from out of state or just around the corner, we feel confident that we will meet all of your real estate needs. Don't hesitate to call us today for that Personal and Professional approach!
Realtor at ReMax Northern Properties specializing in the listing and selling of new and existing construction.

Helping Sellers sell, helping buyers buy and helping investors make money. Servicing the Birmingham and surrounding areas. Jefferson County, Shelby County, St. Clair County, Blount Count and Bibb County

description:
As a real estate agent who's an expert in Birmingham and the surrounding areas, I bring a great wealth of knowledge and expertise about buying and selling the perfect home for my clients. I pride myself on being honest, trustworthy and consistent in the real estate industry. Deciding to buy or sell a home is one of the biggest investments and decisions you will make in a lifetime. When you hire me as your agent, you will be getting a highly trained negotiator, marketer and customer service expert.

I've worked in Sales Management for over 30 yrs. This included training sales management for major corporations . A top producer and trainer. I was on the board of the Hoover City schools co-op educational program. An Ambassador with the Hoover Chamber of Commerce. I'm very involved with my church serving and out reach in various  communities in Birmingham.Married with a daughter in college studying Vet Science.  You need someone who knows the area inside and out. I can work with you to find the right home at the right price. . If you choose to sell a home whether to upgrade downsize or otherwise, you will need someone, who will advertise your home. Let's get started!!!!!

Being a good realtor means getting to know your client. Listening to you helps me gain a true understanding of your wants and needs. These are big decisions and I take them seriously. So before we get started, let me share a little about myself. I live in on Logan Martin Lake with my husband Dwight and our cat Oreo.   My husband is a local attorney. We share four children, two beautiful granddaughters and two handsome grandsons. I retired after twenty years of service with the State of Alabama where I enjoyed a rewarding career serving the public. Afterward I chose to pursue my love for real estate. I was licensed in 2001 and have been living my dream job since.   I was awarded Top Agent in our company in 2012 with over 5 million in sales. I specialize in lake front property and have extensive experience in residential, farms, land, and commercial properties as well as working with Military families. I chose ERA King as my company since they represent the most innovative ideas in technology. ERA King has over 100 agents and 27 support staff members serving 10 counties with 5 locations. One of the oldest companies in the state of Alabama since 1969.I love to help people achieve their real estate dreams, give me a call and lets get started on yours.

Bethany truly has a heart for others. She is an extremely motivated person with a passion for helping people. Prior to starting her career in real estate, she managed a million dollar+ dental practice which helped her hone in her skills of multi-tasking, problem solving, and excellent customer service. With those skills as well as her ability to make a stranger a friend in an instant, she is the perfect piece of the puzzle in helping individuals and families find their perfect match in a home! 
Justin is a committed individual with a great attention to detail. He has set his life foundation on integrity and having a heart for people which has led him to real estate. Formerly, Justin's successes have been in the pest control industry building several businesses from the ground up, with his last success of building a company to over one million in revenue per year. His commitment to his clients will be an asset for you in buying or selling your home. Together they are an asset to you in all Real Estate endeavors. They constantly implement the latest technology in all aspects of the real estate industry. LocAL Realty now offers FULL SERVICE FLAT FEE listings to save customers thousands on the selling of their homes. WE HAVE SAVED OUR CLIENTS OVER 1 MILLION IN LISTING FEES! For example, on a 200,000 home we'd save a seller 3,100! Bethany and Justin were high school sweethearts and are now married with four young children: Henry, Charlie, Callie, & Emma. They enjoy spending time together as a family playing outside, going on adventures, fishing, and their weekly Friday pizza/movie night'. With this duo, you get knowledge, as well as motivation and passion that is unmatched!

I became a RE/MAX® agent because there is no greater fulfillment than to help someone buy or sell a home! My primary focus, whether working with buyers or sellers, is a genuine interest in my clients real estate needs and building relationships that last a lifetime. I am committed to hard work and personalized service in an effort to exceed the expectations of my clients.

I am a resident of Pell City, Alabama, which is known as the Gateway of Logan Martin Lake. Pell City is one of the fastest growing communities in Alabama with amenities found in much larger cities and has retained that small, hometown charm. Growing up in Calhoun County, AL, I am very knowledgeable of Pell City and surrounding communities.

With more than 30 years experience in the mortgage industry, an Accounting degree, and my love for helping buyers obtain homeownership becoming a RE/MAX® agent was the perfect fit!
neighborhood_desc: A beautiful neighborhood in Pell City.

description:
Dawn Leone-Parker is an acknowledged expert of Birmingham's outstanding neighborhoods. She works personally with local home rehab experts in creating Pride of the Neighborhood Homes for not only investors, but consumers looking for their dream homes. This, combined with her excellent marketing skills and keen eye for detail,  creates a winning combination for anyone buying, selling or even, renting their home. She also has created a niche in the real estate market by providing concierge services for long distance buyers relocating to the Birmingham area.

Dawn Parker is immensely successful in real estate because of her commitment to excellence. She is a skilled negotiator and provides an incomparable level of service by applying her outstanding skills to every step of the buying or selling process, resulting in a seamless transaction from contract to closing.

A testimonial from one her clients sums it up quite well, "It was a pleasure working with Dawn. She's very professional and helped my wife & I throughout the entire process. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for a real estate agent. Thank you so much!."

Her knowledge and professionalism are far beyond the norm for the industry. Her clients report that she is diligent, efficient and eager to address challenges. One of her buyers enthusiastically stated, "Dawn is the best in the business.  We use her exclusively for selling & buying our properties. Her vastly superior knowledge of all markets in the Birmingham area sets her lightyears above anyone else."

When time allows, Dawn is involved with her church & local charities.  She enjoys the arts, football and traveling.
Professional Realtor, high energy and motivated to make your dreams come true.  My clients love home shopping with me and I think you will too.  Call me today to start your home search!

Vastly Experienced in Buying & Selling Real Estate with over 35 years'worth of knowledge & skills. Regardless of the value of the home, I will represent your interests in negotiations & working out the best deal!

I am a multi million dollar producer  in the  St Clair County and Northeast Jefferson County area. I am  very compassionate and knowledgeable  about the process of buying or selling a home and or property. As a qualified Real Estate professional I customize my approach with each and every client to make sure to meet all their needs.  I would like to assist you with all your Real Estate needs.

Steve is a 13 year veteran of the real estate industry with experience in residential resales and investment properties. He has been with Keller Williams for 4 years.  He currently is a partner with Red Hawk Realty Group of Keller Williams Realty. He led a team with his wife, Anna, the Steve and Anna Team, until January 2020 when they joined forces with Jerry Sager Homes.  Steve and Jerry are partners in the Red hawk Realty Group.  Anna is the head of Operations for the team.   Steves passion is connecting people with their dreams through the purchase of real estate, whether first time home buyers or seasoned investors. He is with KW Luxury and has been on the ALC at KW Hoover for the past 3 years.  He previously was a Group/Branch Manager in the environmental industry where he managed multi-million dollar environmental assessment and remediation projects for private industrial clients, DOE, DOD, and COE. He holds a B.S. in Geology and Marine Science and an M.S. in Geology from the University of Alabama.

I am a full-time realtor dedicated to serving both clients and community to the best of my ability. With over 20 years prior experience in the construction equipment/supply industry, I've learned that service is key to any successful transaction. My commitment to this business is to continually increase education, along with building and maintaining valuable relationships with other realtors, vendors and the community in order to best serve you every step of the way. I will listen to exactly what you're looking for in your new home and search only listings and off-market properties which best suit your criteria rather than driving you all over town hoping to find something that will "fit". 
I will do a free market analysis on your property, pulling information from online sources. I will also research sales history from your community, comparing homes currently active for sale in order to find your best list price. Your property is most valuable its first day on the market. Let's price it right and sell it quickly! 
I will hire professional photographers to present your home to the market at its best. 
I use a strong, strategic social-media marketing plan, including personal videos showcasing your property. 
I utilize collaboration with other realtors in the area in order to attract the most buyers when selling, and to find exactly what you want when buying. 
You can expect open communication and total patience during the entire process. 

In addition to my real estate business, my family also owns Southland BBQ Restaurant and Food Truck. As a fun way to celebrate the sale/purchase of your home, I enjoy providing FREE BBQ for 10 people after closing. You can use this to feed neighbors at a housewarming or to "encourage" your friends to help you move!

I am a chaplain at Serving You Ministries and it's one of the highlights of my week to pray with people and learn their stories.

I am the Broker and Owner of Legacy Home Realty. I am a second generation real estate agent with over 14 years experience helping home buyers find their dream homes, sellers sell their homes, and investors build their portfolios. I work the entire Birmingham and surrounding areas.

Personally, I go to Church of the Highlands were I am a small group leader and serve on the online campus. I also volunteer as a Biblical Counselor. I have 2 wonderful sons, Blake and Justin. I served 12 years in the United States Coast Guard and I love America! (Especially Alabama)

My Company offers complete REO/Asset Management Services, Property Conditions Reports, BPOs, Drive By or Interior, CMAs, Digital Photos, Occupancy Checks within 24 hours, Cash for Keys, Re-Keys, Eviction, Trash Outs,Landscaping, Repairs, Marketing of REO listing

When choosing a Realtor I always say, "pick a realtor that you feel truly has your best interest at heart!"  I pride myself on listening to exactly what my clients expect and are looking for whether it is selling their home or purchasing a home.  I strive for excellence and work hard for each of my clients so when we find the perfect home for them, they feel like it was the easiest, most smooth process! And I am. I am a mother, a wife, a sister, a daughter...I am an active community member in my hometown of Trussville. I have a strong working relationship with other REALTORS in my community, and believe in good old fashioned networking. About Zac:

To understand Zacs commitment to his clients and the value he offers individuals and families interested in buying or selling a home, its important to understand his background and interests.

Zac Waldrop grew up in Oxford, Alabama with his parents, Wayne and Jane Waldrop and an extended family that he cherishes to this day. As a young man, he had a passion for music, sports, and learning. He always knew he wanted to leave a legacy and help as many people as he could along the way. 

After graduating from Oxford High School in 2000, Zac was offered a full academic scholarship to Jacksonville State University. During his time at JSU, he decided to pursue his love of music and joined a band based in Auburn, AL. He transferred to Auburn University in the middle of his sophomore year and has since been a die-hard Tiger and fan of Auburn athletics ever since. 

Having earned a Marketing degree from Auburn in 2004, Zac went to work for Alabamas largest heavy equipment company, coordinating their rental department at their Oxford branch. Soon after, he took a position at the companys headquarters in Birmingham as a finance representative and since 2006 has called the Birmingham area home. 

Holding multiple positions and responsibilities (including overseeing the legal department and negotiating contracts on behalf of the company), Zac decided to pursue his Masters degree in business from the University of Alabama Birmingham while working full time. He completed his coursework in less than eighteen months and is now a proud Blazer alum as well. In early 2014, after nearly a decade of office work, Zac decoded to pursue a career in real estate, which afforded him the opportunity to establish the legacy he always wanted and help individuals and families through one of the most important times of their lives. He joined Keller Williams Metro South in September of 2014. 

Since entering the real estate business, Zac has been responsible for the sale of over 8.5 million dollars in real estate and, more importantly, helped dozens of families along the way. After only his second year, Zac was awarded the Keller Williams Bronze Award for Top Performing Agents and is very active in his office. His many five-star reviews on Zillow indicate that his clients trust and appreciate Zac while considering him a friend and ally outside the realm of real estate. 

When he isnt selling homes, Zac likes to relax by reading, playing golf, and (of course) playing music. Zac married his wife, Ellas, on April 18, 2015. They have two dogs together: Marley, a twelve-year-old black lab who thinks shes a cat, and Jack, a nine-year-old golden retriever who has no idea he only has three legs.

About Keller Williams Realty Metro South:

We understand that buying or selling a home is more than just a transaction: its a life-changing experience. Thats why our team of highly-seasoned real estate professionals is dedicated to providing exceptional, personalized service for all of our clients. We take great pride in the relationships we build and always work relentlessly on the clients behalf to help them achieve their real estate goals.

Our team of experts represents the best and brightest in the industry, and were always striving to lead the field in research, innovation, and consumer education. Todays buyers and sellers need a trusted resource that can guide them through the complex world of real estate. With our extensive knowledge and commitment to providing only the best and most timely information to our clients, we are your go-to source for real estate industry insight and advice.

Our Mission Statement:

Our philosophy is simple: clients come first. We pledge to be in constant communication with our clients, keeping them fully informed throughout the entire buying or selling process. We believe that if youre not left with an amazing experience, we havent done our job. We dont measure success through achievements or awards, but through the satisfaction of our clients.

Having held multiple positions with various marketing and sales departments in a number of local firms, Kathryn has also gained valuable experience in digital and social media and event planning. Her position with AL.com enabled her to tap into the heartbeat of the Birmingham as well as build connections that stretch out across the state and beyond. 

In 2014, becoming a member of YP of Birmingham gave her an incredible opportunity to not only network her business and career, but also to incorporate my networking skills in helping others grow. Beginning her third year on the board, her contribution to the YP Birmingham Board will be experience and knowledge of some of the largest firms and companies in Birmingham, past employment with Alabama Media Group which will give YP of Birmingham the opportunity for partnerships in community affairs and the ability reach audiences through different forms of media, and her current connection to first-time home buyers who make Birmingham home.

description:
As a Realtor, my top priority is providing individualized attention and flexibility to each and every one of my clients. No two people are alike; each individual needs and deserves to be treated with special care that meets their specific needs. I serve my clients tirelessly, and they count on me for results - you can too!

Following 25 years as a marketing executive in the commercial construction industry, I made the decision to pursue a career in real estate. This has allowed me to help people one-on-one when making one of the most important financial  decisions of their lives. Being a Realtor provides tremendous satisfaction for me as someone who is passionate about serving others.

My name is Steven Pharo, I am a local agent with Exit Justice Realty. I am a devoted husband to my beautiful wife and a proud father of two boys. I am a family man, hobbyist, cook, and fellow Christian.  I currently reside in the town of Helena, Alabama. My career path started over twenty years ago when I was a young man in the construction field building and remodeling homes. While there I was able to learn what it takes to build a solid and functional quality home. As I moved up in the field my attention was directed to sales. I met lots of interesting people, built many lasting relationships and learned how to excel in customer service. I have enjoyed working with people and within the housing industry for the majority of my life. It only seemed fitting that I should combine the two and become a realtor.                           
   Becoming a Realtor has been challenging, demanding, yet the most rewarding decision I have ever made. Having the opportunity daily to help Sellers, Buyers, and Investors achieve their goals is a blessing. Im able to enjoy the privilege of working with the best professionals in the business, from lenders, title reps, inspectors, contractors, and attorneys; all while being able to travel to many new and exciting places and viewing a variety of wonderful homes. I honestly can say, I truly love what I do for a living.
     You the client are the most important part of why I choose this life. Helping you achieve your goals and find the home of your dreams is my passion. I strive each day to be better than the day before. I have high standards when it comes to taking care of my clients and I do not take this responsibility lightly. After all, you may be entrusting me with one of the biggest purchases of your life, asking to help sell a family home, or hiring me to find the perfect investment property.  My job as your agent is to reduce the stress and worry and to make this an enjoyable and successful experience. You will have direct access to me, my resources, and contacts. I will handle all the negotiations, contracts, clauses, addendums, etc. As well as setting up title, attorney, scheduling inspections and closing dates. You can rest in the fact that I WILL represent you to the fullest of my ability.   
    My goals are simple, to become the best agent I can be for YOU! I specialize in residential, commercial, farm, land lots and investments. I recently was awarded The Top Buyers Agent Award of 2020 from within my company. I have been a realtor for two plus years and have successfully closed several transactions and have had the privilege of helping many people find new homes! If you choose to hire me, I am confident that I can help you find the home of your dreams or find the perfect buyer for the home you need to sell. I look forward working with you and representing you as your agent, God Bless!

Sincerely,
Steven G. Pharo
Exit Justice Realty

My name is Anie Johnson, I am a full time professional real estate agent of Alabama.
I pride myself on offering my clients the highest quality of services and being responsive to their wants/needs!

My goals is to provide you with high quality service from now through closing making the process smooth and easy

I am a Wife and Mother of two beautiful little ladies!! I began my journey in Real Estate after a fulfilling career in Social Services for over 11 years. My passion is to help people reach their Real Estate Goals! Whether you are looking to sell your property or move into your first home, my desire is to assist you by providing professionalism, knowledge, and accuracy tailored to your specific needs. Helping you achieve your real estate goals through a proven step-by-step process created to ensure success!!

Brenda is an experienced, real estate agent who has worked with many buyers and sellers, and investors over the years. She holds an associate broker license, with the state of Alabama at Town Square Realty.  Brenda is a member of the Ala Association of Realtors. Also, has certification  in ABR, and Staging Homes. She is, the birth mother of two, and has an adopted son, and three grands.
Brenda enjoys helping buyers and sellers achieve their home dreams. She loves working with her church in various areas, and has volunteered monthly for many years feeding the homeless at Jessies place for  women and children.
Brenda believes homeownership is a blessing and everyone should experience this.

As a Shelby County native and a passionate real estate professional, Jade values the trust that her clients place in her and strives to exceed their expectations everyday. She has been serving in the Shelby & Jefferson County areas and has been an active member of her real community for years now. She is ecstatic about helping with your home buying and selling needs.

As a proud member of the Town Square Realty family, Jade carries the values of hard work, integrity, and outstanding client service into everything she does. With her background in banking, it is easy to see why families call Jade for help buying and selling.

When she isnt making home ownership dreams come true for her clients, Jade enjoys spending time with her children, woodworking, painting, and creating beautiful works of art not only for herself but for others as well.

I grew up in Jefferson County, Al. and graduated from Mortimer Jordan High School. I got my real estate license, but after a few years I let them go inactive, took a 8 til 4:30 job to keep up with my teenagers and all their activities.  Fast forward, the kids are grown, I retired and realized I didn't have anything to do, so, I activated my license and went back to real estate. I enjoy helping people.

Greetings,
My name is Pam Adams, who has lived in the East Nashville area over 20 years. As a former Nurse, I love serving and taking care of my patients. Now as a Realtor, I will continue to serve and help individuals by finding their dream home. I will find your dream home, list your property, help find investment properties and so much more. In addition, I am a Notary Public, who is able to notarize documents. I will continue to serve the public in non-contentious matter.
I love skating, dancing, listening to different genres of music, and attending concerts throughout the year. I love watching plays at the Tennessee Performance Arts Center; especially when my granddaughter is dancing in The Nutcracker. I enjoyed walking in the Christmas Parade when I was younger; now I enjoy Homecoming Parades and festivities. I love basketball, football, soccer, and golfing. I enjoy walking in the park with my grandchildren and watching them feed the ducks; the expression on their face is priceless. I have modeled in the past; I continue to style and accessorize individuals for any occasion. Family vacations, spending time with friends, having spa day and relaxing helps keep me energized.
Call me at (615) 926-5635, I would love to help you sell, buy, invest and fulfill your Real Estate goals.
							Sincerest Regards,

My name is Helen Taylor and serving my clients in excellence is my top priority! I'm fun and energetic with a magnetic personality. I have a huge heart for helping individuals and families by providing resources on financial responsibility and professional advice on all things real estate. Working with me is an adventure! Let's explore and find exactly what meets your needs.

Helen M. Taylor

My career objective is to help customers/clients with the purchase and/or sale of residential and small scale commercial real estate, specializing in existing single family residential and new home construction.
There are many qualities and skills that go into being an excellent real estate professional - integrity, in-depth community and market knowledge, marketing savvy, effective negotiation skills and a high-quality professional network, all of which are hallmarks of how I work.
That said, in my experience as a real estate professional, for over 30 years, I have also found that providing the very best service is essentially about putting my clients first. This means keeping myself accessible, being a good listener as well as a good communicator, and responding quickly to your needs.
My work experience includes: complete comparative market analysis, maintaining MLS service and website management on listed properties, facilitate mortgage information with clients, order and coordinate all closing documents, troubleshoot issues regarding the sell or purchase of property, including survey, termite, title, home inspections, credit, etc. I am available 24/7 and can be reached easily.  All calls are returned promptly.
This "client first" philosophy has always been my approach and it requires me to continually improve my skills and ways of doing business. In addition, I've found that the latest technologies are enabling us to do everything I've always done, only much more quickly and efficiently. T also technology has helped to extend the range of services I provide to my clients.
I am a member of the Birmingham Association of Realtors, the National Association of Realtors, Club of Excellence - Life Member and Vulcan Award (10 consecutive years).  I am a real estate broker, license and certifications include; E-Pro, CRS, ABR and CDPE. 
So when you decide that you'd like to buy or sell a home in the Birmingham/Jefferson/Shelby/Walker/St. Clair County Areas areas please contact us.

Hi I'm Brittney! I absolutely LOVE being a Realtor! I love assisting clients and watching their dreams and goals come alive! I have worked several years in the Correctional industry working with both male and female offenders. That experience exposed me to people at some of the lowest times in their lives; but now I am able to work with people at one of the greatest times in their lives!

Hi! I am a member of Rock Mountain Lake Baptist Church, a fire wife, boy mom, and business women. I love helping people find the home of their dreams, a house to flip and resale, or just selling their house to travel. Whatever you need I am here to help. I grew up in West Alabama and attended Brookwood High School. I spent 5 years in Livingston, Alabama where I attended UWA. I currently live in McCalla with my husband and two little boys. I am very familiar with Bibb,Jefferson, Shelby, and Tuscaloosa Counties. Please do not hesitate to contact me with your buying, selling, or relocation needs.

My success in real estate is attributed to experience, professionalism, and commitment to service in an area in which I enjoy living. Helping individuals find the right property is one of my strongest values.

I have extensive knowledge of the real estate industry and our local marketplace. I take pride in my attention to detail and put all my efforts into understanding your needs. I constantly educate myself on the latest trends in the marketplace as it is my goal to be able to provide you with top notch service, all the time.

Buying or selling your home should be a memorable and pleasant experience. Real estate is one of the most exciting investments one can make, and I would love to help you find the communities and properties which suit you best. Should you also need help valuing and selling your home, I would be delighted to help.

As an e-Pro certified Realtor® I can provide all of the resources that you need to buy or sell a home, as well as learn about the market value of homes in the area. Please contact me today so that together we can begin this exciting journey. I look forward to servicing all of your real estate needs.

description:
Wyonna Baldwin brings her experience as an U.S. Army veteran. Prior to becoming a realtor, she served in the U.S. Army for 8 years. As a soldier, she learned how to be patient, detail-oriented, proactive, discipline, integrity and to be attentive to the needs of others.

Wyonna will be an advocate for you. Whether you are buying or selling she will work diligently to promote your best interests. If you are selling, she will work with you to get you the fairest price, in the least amount of time, by using state-of-the-art technology, collaboration, and superior marketing materials. If you are buying, she will work hard to provide you with the best information and market data to inform and assist you so you can be a well-equipped buyer with the strongest possible negotiating.

Wyonna understands that buying and selling real estate can be stressful. As a full-time broker/owner of Movement Realty, LLC, she will work hard to lower your stress level and make your experience as gratifying as possible. She will accomplish this through constant communication and by being accessible.

Wyonna has been an area resident since 2005 and earned his bachelors degree in Human Resource Management at Athens State University in Athens Alabama. She recognizes the unique characteristics and benefits of living and working in Jefferson County, Shelby County, St. Clair County, and Tuscaloosa County, as well as all other surrounding counties.

When not assisting clients, Wyonna enjoys spending time with her family, and traveling.

Following in the footsteps of my mother I decided to obtain my real estate license in 2010. I am a 2007 graduate of The University of Alabama-Birmingham with a degree in Accounting. I enjoy working with both buyers and sellers to help them realize their goals in real estate.Please give me a call and let me help you sell your home or find the home of your dreams.

description:
Self-starter, self-motivator, encourager and entrepreneur are just a few words that can be used when describing Tomeka Bell. Tomeka was born in Alabama but spent most of her formative years in the bustling city of Los Angeles, California. Her parents and three siblings made the move back to Alabama in 1993 to take over the familys business, Green Acres Café, when her grandfathers health began to fail. In 2005, Tomeka followed in her familys footsteps and became the CEO of Green Acres Café.  
 
Professionally, Tomeka worked as a licensed cosmetologist for 23 years before retiring. In 2014, she decided to pursue another love, real estate. Tomeka has had a passion for real estate from an early age. It all started with an interest in houses and their floor plans. She can always remember paying more attention to detail and trying to figure out how to make the homes better. As time passed, she began to develop a desire to help people Pursue their goals and dreams of being a homeowner. Whether the purchase is for an investor that is looking to create stability and wealth or first-time homebuyers, assisting empty nesters downsize, upsizing newlyweds from their starter home no matter the circumstance she takes great pride in the PROCESS and the relationships that are formed along the way. In 2018 and 2019 she successfully closed 24 units.
 
As a middle child, Tomeka has developed a sincere devotion and desire to help and serve others. With such she exhibits a strong work ethic and prides herself on being punctual and professional in every situation. Her experience along with her faith has given her a toolkit to maintain her equanimity in every situation! She firmly believes in Colossians 3:23, Whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord and not for men, as a guiding principle in her business and all she does.
 
However, her greatest joy in life is being the wife of Russel Bell, Jr. a firefighter for Mountain Brook-Hoover and mothering her two beautiful daughters Jalin (23) and Christian (16). When shes not busy showing homes, handling business at Green Acres or serving in ministry, she can be found spending time bowling, swimming, traveling or cuddling with her 8-year-old fur-baby Cassidy, the miniature schnauzer!

Susan Lehman is not just another Realtor. After retiring as a Special Education Teacher, she decided to pursue a career in residential real estate. In 2012, she joined Keller Williams Metro South in Alabaster and quickly became of her agencys top producers. Shortly thereafter, she built a team of industry professionals, Team Lehman, to better assist her customers in the selling and buying processes.

In Susans first year as a Realtor, she was awarded Rookie of the Year and, in 2017, was invited to serve on Keller Williams Agent Leadership Council, where only the top 5% are invited to serve. 

Selling your home is a business which requires in-depth marketing expertise and communication skills. Susans undergraduate and graduate degrees from the University of Alabama in both Education and Administration have played a key role in her success in that regard.

Over the last four-and-a-half years that Susan has been in real estate, she sold 120 homes, totaling approximately 20,000,000.00 dollars in sales. During the first half of 2017 alone, she sold 31 homes for a total of 5,007,000.00 dollars in sales. As an expert in marketing homes in our local area, Susan provides her clients with a wealth of knowledge and expertise about buying and selling real estate which outside agents simply cannot offer. No market is identical. Therefore, buyers and sellers need a local, professional agent they can trust for up-to-date and relevant information. 

Here are some of the things Susan and Team Lehman can do for you:

Find Your Next Home  When you are looking for a new home, you need someone who knows the area inside and out!  Susan and Team Lehman will work with you to find the right home at the right price, including all the neighborhood amenities that matter - not to mention the essential criteria you have for your ideal home.

Sell a Home - When it's time to sell, Susan and Team Lehman will advertise your home, show it to prospective buyers, negotiate the purchase contract, help guide you through the financing process, oversee inspections, handle all necessary paperwork, and facilitate the closing. They will take care of everything you need, from list to close.

Consult on Home Selling Tactics  Oftentimes, buyers don't visualize living in your home the same way you do. Susan and Team Lehman will help you make your home attractive to prospective buyers - which can help you get top dollar. Things like staging the home, making repairs or minor improvements, or even simply painting the walls can be the difference between a home languishing on the market or selling quickly and for the best price.

Jake is a licensed realtor with extensive experience in sales, merchandising, and customer service. Jake is known for approaching every opportunity with a positive and proactive "can-do" attitude. If you ask Jake's clients, you will learn that they are consistently impressed by his responsiveness and his compassionate communication skills. Jake also possesses a special flair for style and design, which he has further refined through renovating numerous properties during the past 10 years.          

Jake is a true hometown realtor--born and raised as the youngest of seven children in Birmingham's historic Bluff Park district. Jake believes in paying homage to his Birmingham roots by supporting our fabulous array of local restaurants and businesses. As the single father of a 10-year-old son named Matthew (and two fur babies), Jake is deeply invested in nurturing each of Birmingham's unique communities and building a strong future for our gorgeous city!

description:
Shane was born and raised in Miami, Florida but has lived in the Birmingham area since 2014. After graduating salutatorian of his high school class, he attended Auburn University and graduated Cum Laude in 2014 with a Masters Degree in Public Administration and a minor in Political Science. While at Auburn University, Shane also performed contract work for the United States Department of Defense, and completed an internship with the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms, and Explosives (ATF). In addition to his real estate career, Shane also works for a local law enforcement agency as a supervisor over community outreach, hiring, and records. He is a former Crisis and Hostage Negotiator with specialized training from the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI). Shane blends his law enforcement experience and training in communication with the real estate market and contract negotiation to find his clients the best deal for their situation. For over 5 years, he patrolled the North Shelby, Indian Springs, and Chelsea communities and had the privilege of intimately learning these areas and getting to know the people there. After owning and operating a landscaping company for 7 years alongside his law enforcement career, Shane began pursuing his new passion for Real Estate, and is devoted to helping people find their dream home in any market.

Shane is married to Brittney Plyler, who is an attorney in the local community. They are both members of the Church of the Highlands in the Greystone campus, and are fully invested in supporting the local community.

Outside of real estate, Shane enjoys hiking, mountain biking, golf, and world-traveling with his wife. They hope to plant deep roots and raise a family in the Birmingham community.

description: Team TNT is your one stop shop for buying, selling, credit repair, & finding the right loan program! From Lincoln to Tuscaloosa and Clanton to Gardendale, weve got you covered!

I bring to your home buying and/or selling transaction over 10 years experience in  residential home sales.  I have extensive experience in new construction home sales as well as existing home sales.  

My Accredited Buyers Representative designation assures you, the purchaser, that I have your best interest in mind at all times. Whether your new home is an existing home, completed new construction home, or building project from the ground up, I will be there to guide you through the entire process.  Home hunting is easy when you have experience on your side. 

Sellers need all the help they can get in today's market.  I will help you get your home ready for showings so that your home sets the standards in your community.  That will bring you the fastest sale and highest sales price for your home. 

 I would love to meet with you to discuss how my marketing plan will benefit you! 

Accredited Buyers Representative; Certified Residential Specialist; Life Memeber Club of Excellence; RE/MAX 100% Club 2014; RE/MAX Hall of Fame - Over $1,000,000 Gross Commission Dollars Generated; RE/MAX First Choice Pelham Office - Top Producing Agent 2009; Nominated for Birmingham Association of Realtors - Sales Associate of the Year - 2007; Member-Birmingham Association of Realtors; Alabama Association of Realtors; National Association of Realtors; Married for 28 years with 2 Children

Having raised her children in the Hoover, area, it is Jeanie's pleasure to help other families enjoy all the benefits this area of town provides, with home ownership.  As a child of an Air Force colonel, Jeanie moved every three years so I understand the moving process and all the emotions that come with it. She is there to guide you through the process whether it is your first home or you are moving for the fourth time.

Jeanie brings a wealth of professional sales and negotiations experience to her real estate business.  Having worked in the healthcare field for many years negotiating large managed care contracts, her extensive experience has served her clients well.

  Call her today to begin your journey of a new home.

Top Producer - Shelby - 2009-2020 Buying or Selling? Call, e-mail or text me today. I am ready to assist you in all your real estate needs. I promise to make the process enjoyable, informative, educational  and memorable. I do what I love and I love what I do!

Kevin is a top producers at Keller Williams Realty Metro South office. Kevin has a passion for helping people, that is why he chose the real estate career path. Kevin conducts all transactions with professionalism and the utmost integrity. Kevin has been a Shelby County resident for over 40 years and is married to Cindy Jones and they have two wonderful boys. Voted Best real estate agent in Shelby County 2015 and 2016. Kevin has been on the ALC since 2011(Agent Leadership Council) ALC makes up the top 20% of a market center. Kevin has been Technology chair for Keller Williams Realty Metro South in 2011,2012,2013,2014,2015,2016.

David (DJ) Greer has been an active member of his community for five years now, and is so excited to be turning that community focus toward real estate. With a passion for service in the Greater Birmingham area, DJ is ready to help with your home buying and selling needs. As a proud member of the EXP Reality family, DJ carries the values of hard work, integrity, and outstanding client service into everything he does. DJ has ten plus years of military service with the Air force and is looking forward to continuing his service and using the knowledge he gains to help with his real estate career. When DJ isnt making homeownership dreams come true for his clients, he enjoys spending time outdoors and traveling with his family and friends. DJ lives in Jemison, AL, with his wife Karyn and daughter Alyson.

Stephanie is a Birmingham native and has lived in many parts of the city and surrounding areas throughout her entire life.  She has been a full-time real estate agent since 2006.  She began her real estate business as a way to have more flexibility with her children's busy schedules and found that real estate is more than just flexibility...it is her PASSION. 

Stephanie is a wife, a mom, a mother-in-law as well as a Lolly to one precious grandson.  She is a Shelby county resident and is a member of Church of the Highlands.  Faith is an imperative part of Stephanie's life and business and treats each client like one of her own family members.

Professionally, Stephanie loves working with buyers and sellers.  She is a Military Relocation Professional which blesses her with the opportunity to work with many military families who are relocating in and out of the Birmingham area.  She is a Shelby County resident and spends much of her time serving the Helena, Alabaster, Pelham, Chelsea and Hoover areas, although she also serves all of Shelby and Jefferson County as well as parts of Tuscaloosa, Bibb and St. Clair County.

I am an experienced real estate professional with more than thirty-two years  experience in public administration, strategic planning, human resource management, risk management and budgeting. It would be my pleasure to put my expertise in contract negotiation, complex problem solving, and relationship building to work for you in procuring the sale or purchase of your home or property.  I have a Bachelors of Science degree in Mathematics and Biology from Birmingham-Southern College and a Masters of Business Administration from Samford University.  I have lived and worked in central Alabama my entire life and have a deep understanding of the areas opportunities and its beauty. I have been married for over thirty years and have an adult daughter.  My family belongs to Bluff Park United Methodist Church in Hoover. Currently, I serve on the Neighborhood Housing Services of Birmingham Executive Board and the Health Credit Union Board of Directors. My goal is to maximize your satisfaction in the buying and/or selling of your home, and to earn your trust and confidence for generations.

Whether you are buying or selling a home, let us help make that journey easier.  A home is a significant investment.  We understand and appreciate how important it is to make the right decisions. 

Our focus is on doing what's best for each buyer and each seller by providing the guidance and support they need. It's not just another house -- it's your home! Allow us to help you, your family, and your friends with any real estate needs.
"Have nothing in your houses that you do not know to be useful or believe to be beautiful." - William Morris

After 20 plus years in high profile leadership role with a Fortune 500 company, Lisa decided to take her experience to the Real Estate World. Lisa "Believes" that everyone should have the chance to own a beautiful home. Lisa loves this quote from Dave Ramsey, The Financial Guru: " When getting help with money, whether it's Insurance, Real Estate or Investment you should always look for someone with the HEART OF A TEACHER, not the HEART OF SALESMAN! " Lisa has the HEART OF A TEACHER ready to join you on your home buying/selling journey together. BELIEVE AND YOU ARE HALFWAY THERE!

As the broker of Pro Home Team Realty, I personally have had 33+ years of being in the home industry.  I have 17 years of Real Estate Sales experience specializing in Custom New Home Construction.  I also have approx 16+ years of interior design experience, which has helped tremendously with helping my clients with staging and being prepared for marketing their homes to get top dollar for their most prized investment!  Pro Home Team Realty is eager to help you with many options for your budget to help you to get your house SOLD!  We can list your home for as little as a $2,500 FLAT FEE* listing.  Give us a call to discuss a professional plan that is right for your situation.

Hello everyone!  After 14 years of coaching basketball, I decided to hang up my whistle and become a REALTOR!  I've been a REALTOR for about a year now and have already had 33 closings, with 2 more under contract!  I aim to be as efficient as possible, and take as much work off your shoulders as I can.  Each buyer or seller has a different story, and I'm always excited to be a part of it!  Let me know how I can help you, and I'll do my best and work hard for you!

Chad began his career as a Realtor in 1997 after graduating from the University of Alabama in 1995 and spending a couple of years working for a Birmingham financial planning firm. He has built a great reputation among his peers and throughout the community by being knowledgeable, friendly, easy to work with, honest, and hard working. This has led to Chad to being consistently ranked among the top Realtors, not only in the local area, but in the State of Alabama.

Chad is driven by his desire to provide high quality and personal service to his clients. Buying or selling a home is a big deal on a financial and emotional level and each family and situation is different. Chad understands this and walks with his clients through the complex issues to make things as easy as possible. With over 20 years of experience and hundreds of real estate transactions behind him, Chad has the knowledge and ability to help his clients avoid many pitfalls and craft solutions as challenges arise.

Chad and his wife, Jennifer, have two children, Parker and Halle. Chelsea, Alabama has been home for the Beasleys since 2006. He stays active by working out and playing tennis and enjoys watching college football. The family enjoys being a part of their church family at Double Oak Community Church.

Jeremy is married to the former Gina Gentry of Clay, Alabama and they have 6 wonderful children, Nyah, Keagan, Ava Grace, Lincoln, Alistair & Rhys. He enjoys Movies, Video Gaming with his kids, playing Softball, Alabama Football & Atlanta Braves Baseball. A former collegiate athlete in Baseball for Berea College & later Miles College, Jeremy earned his Bachelor of Arts degree in Public Relations & Marketing in 2005. You'll find that Jeremy is intricately positioned professionally to assist you in all facets of your home search or sale.

Annie (Anne) is a Realtor® serving the public since 2006 in real estate knowledge on buying and selling. Licensed in Alabama and in Virginia. I enjoy helping people to achieve the American Dream, and to build wealth, through home ownership. I educate and prepare clients for buying and selling. I keep myself informed about the latest market trends. I love what I get to do. It's important to me to first shine with my family as a mother, grandmother, teacher of the word (by example first).  I'm a born entrepreneur opening my first business at the age of 28 while raising three beautiful children as a single mother. Determine, motivated, kind and patient. Let me put these unstoppable skills to work for you. You can do this!

Please give me a call or send an email to let me know how I can be of assistance.

I LOVE real estate! But even more than I love real estate, I love people! So helping people buy and sell real estate is right up my alley! If you are in the market for a new home, or if you are getting ready to sell your current home, please consider me when choosing a realtor!

I have an extensive history in counseling, marketing, and advertising. As your realtor I will truly listen to you to understand what it is that you want and need, and will then help you achieve your goals! The mortgage process can be daunting, scary, and overwhelming. There is no reason for you to undergo this process in the dark and alone. Let's work together to meet and exceed all your goals in your real estate ventures.

I have lived my entire life in central Alabama and I can help you locate the right community for you and your family. I have an intimate knowledge of the communities in and around Birmingham including Jefferson, Shelby, and Chilton Counties. Whether buying or selling, I couldn't be happier about servicing the community where I grew up and choose to raise my own family. Let me put my resources, talent, personality, experience, and organization to work for you!

Dont forget, when you need a friend in real estate, TALK TO THE HAND!

Whether you are looking to purchase or sell a home I'm here to assist. I grew up in Birmingham with 4 brothers and 1 sister and have been a life long residence of Birmingham and surrounding communities. I currently reside in Vestavia Hills.  My All Star Realty office is located in Vestavia Hills also. .Being from Birmingham I have seen our city grow and change in many positive ways. We've become much more diverse with our population. UAB attracts medical students from all over the world. I feel that being from Birmingham gives me an advantage in the Real Estate profession. I do not limit myself to working in one particular area of town. Prior to becoming a Realtor, I worked in a corporate environment for over 18 years before moving into retail sales. I continued this path for approximately 6 years and have now been a licensed Realtor since 2000. Besides completing courses to my real estate licenses; I've continued my education and earned my ABR (Accredited Buyers Representative) and CRS (Certified Real Estate Specialist) designations. I work hard to stay connected and keep up to date on the local real estate market. Please reach out to me with any questions and I'd appreciate the opportunity to work for you!

Marcia looks forward to hearing from you.Search for your next new home or ask for a market study of the value of your present home from their web site.Marcia holds the designations of :ABR, CRS &  Institute of Luxury HomesShe is a member of Women's Council of Realtors & IRECMarcia and Carl have two daughters , who both live out of town.Laura and her family lives in Minneapolis, Mn. How about you? Tell us how you stay close to the people you love.If we can be of service, please give us a call !

Pam's expertise, great communication and listening skills has allowed her many years of great success in serving Birmingham while specializing in Jefferson and Shelby County with existing homes and new construction sales.  Home buying is one of the largest investments you will ever make.  Assistance from a professional Realtor is key to you and your families success in finding the perfect house to call home!

Tony Alvarez is a fully builingual, English and Spanish speaking, Realtor® from California who brings his knowledge and expertise to the beautiful people of Alabama. Tony enter the world of real estate in 1996 by working as a rent collector for a property management company specialized in providing affordable housing for low income families in South Central Los Angeles. His work ethic and leadership help him move to the maintenance supervisor position, and shortly after as Property Manager. During that time, Tony fell in love with the real estate industry and became a Licensed Realtor®, starting his career with Century 21 A-Team in the city of Bellflower. His property management and construction knowledge together with his ability to communicate with either CEOs or maintenance crews, plus his planning and delegating skills, helped him to work with investors looking to increase their rental portfolios, either in the multi-unit or commercial space.

Tony is known for offering his clients an exclusive VIP treatment and is committed to provide them the highest quality representation and professionalism, along with superb customer service and individualized marketing strategies while understanding the needs of his clients.

His personable and professional character allows Tony to build and maintain solid relationships, with clients and other real estate professionals and his unique style and background allows him to connect with people of all ages.

Tonys experience in many different areas allows him to offer his clients a diverse range of expertise from representing clients on both the buying and selling side, investments, development and financing.

As a Realtor licensed in Alabama, Amy provides marketing and transaction management services to her clients across the Birmingham market, specializing in Shelby County. Her business is built on Dedication, Determination, Communication and Trust while encompassing the ability to cater and adapt to all of her clients real estate needs. Whether you are buying or selling, she will work tirelessly to promote your best interests. If you are selling, she will work with you to get you the fairest price, in the least amount of time. If you are buying, she will work hard to provide you with the best information and market data to inform and assist you so that you can be a well equipped buyer with the strongest possible negotiating position.
